page.title: 05A Day of my Life
page.content: My name is Tareth Eastwood. I live at the village shop in Hinchliffe Mill with my mother and father and my younger brother. We have three pets a cat, a dog and a pony. On Saturday morning I get up at 7.30am. and take the dog for a walk. After breakfast I pack up some lunch and walk to the stables to see my pony Crackle. I wear riding clothes and I stay all day at the stables. I brush Crackle and then tack him up and go riding. I wear a jockey cap now as they are safer than the old type of hat.
